TimeEventsOverlap: There are active events that overlap. The daily routine might not be predictable.
ChapterAreNotSupportedForDailyRoutines: Chapter editing for daily routines is not supported. Changes to the daily routine will affect all chapters. Instead you should use one of an action node in a dialog or quest to manipulate the daily routine of npcs.
DialogWillCloseOnSaveOfNewMarker: This dialog will close as soon the new object was saved or the window is closed. If the object was saved a new marker will be inserted.
Name: Name
YouAreEditingANonDefaultChapter: You are currently not changing the default chapter. All changes, apart from daily routine changes, are only valid from the current chapter onwards.

DrawClickLastPointToEndLine: Click last point to finish this line.
